title: Daily Yoga - Yoga Fitness Plans
description:
We‚Äôre here for you! Daily Yoga opens a Free Collection for you to provide 6 programs and 13 sessions free to everyone, plus the up to 80% Special Off of subscription. We hope to help users to stay safe and keep positive during the uncertain time!

If you're a beginner to yoga, Daily Yoga App provides various guided classes to help you learn the basics before diving into more advanced classes and flows, and if you're advanced‚Äîthere are plenty of the world - class teachers you want to follow with.		

Featured as ‚ÄúWorks with Google Fit‚Äù,‚ÄúTop Developer‚Äù,‚ÄúClear Your MindÔºå Engage Your Body‚Äù, ‚ÄúKeep Calm & Carry On‚Äù in Google Play, 
Voted as‚Äù Best Yoga App‚Äù of the year 2016-2019 by Healthline, 
Awarded by The Wall Street Journal as the ‚Äú5 Addictive Fitness Apps‚Äù.

Various Classes Fit Your Goal‚Ä®
Daily Yoga offers 500+ asanas, 70+ yoga programs, 500+ guided yoga, pilates, meditation sessions plus the largest yoga pose library for man and woman that suit yogis from beginner to advanced. Not only helps you stay with yoga every day, but also provides health benefits for both your mind and body.

Follow the World-Class Master
Altogether 20 yoga masters who are globally respected or the initiator of yoga styles focus on yoga for weight loss, beginner to advanced, better sleep & full relax. Aim to make it easier & convenient to yoga workout and provide programs that align with your current goals. All sessions are taught in English. 

Motivated by Community
The community in Daily Yoga App brings yogis from all over the world closer to one another. Yogis gather here to discuss their practicing experience under the topics, tag and encourage each other to finish the challenge, follow the Yoga Tips to improve their techniques, prepare the weight-control meals according to the selected recipes. Never feel lonely, and become more limber with other motivated yogis around you.

Create Private Yoga Plan
Don‚Äôt like to choose  the default plan? You can create yours. Private Yoga plan is a cycle of 7 days. Set the workout days and rest days according to your own schedule. Then you can combine yoga sessions to each workout day according to your need. If you know your body well, please give it a try to make your workout more efficient.

Adjust to Your Habits¬†
Multiple choices for session duration varied from 5 - 70 minutes to fit your schedule, and 7 languages available worldwide (English, Japanese, Korean, Spanish, Chinese, German, French). Support for Dark Mode to help to prevent eye strain.

Track Your Activity
Personal data from various devices can be tracked in App. With smart watch, you can track your exercise duration and calories burned and heart rate to contribute to your activity rings and meet your daily goals.

While you are waiting for the update to install, try this easy abdominal breathing: draw your abdomen inward to stabilise your core. As you inhale, bring your fingertips to touch in front of the belly. As you exhale, open your hands out to the sides. Inhale the future, exhale the past. Have fun with it!‚Ä®

Find out even more at http://www.dailyyoga.com;
Contact:
Email: support@dailyyoga.com
Instagram: @DailyYogaApp
Facebook: facebook.com/DailyYogaApp

Privacy Policy: http://www.dailyyoga.com/privacy.html 
Terms of Service: http://www.dailyyoga.com/terms.html

developerAddress:
Room 3306-12, 33/F, Shui On Centre
6-8 Hong Kong Road
Wanchai, Hong Kong
recentChanges:
You can enjoy the new Smart Coach now, with 7 categories and over 400 sessions waiting for serving your personal preference.
1. SCHEDULE supports the retake of missed sessions in history now. Try and get more circles.
2. Another upgrade! Tap the screen to check the pose list while exercising. It's much easier to browse and switch poses now.
3. New Courses in November: Winter Energy Flow-Intermediate Element Yoga, Easy Morning Yoga.
Monthly Golden Day, Thanksgiving, and Black Friday are coming!
comments: I keep using the app often. However, it has many bugs to be fixed. The smart coach shows sessions I did as not done. The time is off by a day so I cannot start my training at the correct day. The contact link connects to a share experience link instead. So how to contact you directly? Navigation through the app is not intuitive and it is congested with a lot of ballast. I'd appreciate very much a simplified version that is more straightforward to use.

Smart Coach was available for silver members. Now they have changed it only for gold members. It is like changing the game rules during the game. May be they will take away other things!!! Very poor taste of business. Although I love the app, I am thinking of switching to the other app just for this reason. Lack of business ethics, and in a yoga app. Another issue with the program. Now they have created a schedule to schedule a program. But there is no reschedule option for the missed days. üò≠

The programs and variety are good, but the app is bad. Buggy, and the material you want to get to - ie sessions - is difficult to get to. Constant ads and notifications you can't turn off, even with the Gold subscription, and the support staff's response is either ignoring criticism or suggesting you delete your account. Would suggest looking elsewhere.

This is the best yoga app I have ever tried and worth every penny if you choose to become a gold member. I tested it for a while now. I get usually bored easily with the same routine and this provides loads of options including levels, specific needs, length, time of day, goals,... The list is long and easy to organize with favorites and home page featured workouts. I will be renewing my subscription for sure!

This was my very first time trying yoga, and this was my first session... as a beginner I think it went pretty well. Could really feel my muscles stretching on some of those poses. But I was afraid I wasn't going to hear what the pose was correctly so I tried to keep my phone within eyesight so I could watch the instructor, but I think once I get the hang of it I won't need to look at my phone anymore and I can concentrate more on my poses.

title: Bloomberg: Market & Financial News
description:
Get comprehensive access to global business, stock market and finance news, and trending topics like bitcoin and cryptocurrency.

You can customize the app to monitor your personal portfolio and receive continuous alerts on global stock positions and summarized financial, economic, and corporate information that meets the needs of the global business and financial professional. 

Whether you need to monitor your stock portfolio or just want to discover breaking financial news, Bloomberg provides the news and analysis you require, whenever and wherever you need it. 

FEATURES:

- News: Featured and trending stories in Markets, Industries, Technology, Politics, Luxury, Personal Finance, Opinion and more. 

- Market Data: Latest market data on your customizable portfolio and personalized for your region including Equity Indexes, Futures, Bonds, Commodities & Currencies. 

- Watchlist: Easily track your portfolio by adding a security (stocks, mutual funds, ETFs, currencies, etc.) to your personal Watchlist(s).

- Video: Watch Bloomberg Television Live without the need of any Cable or Satellite subscription. Watch featured videos specifically chosen for top news categories.

- Audio: Listen to interviews and analysis from around the world by the smartest names in Global Finance, Business, Economics & Investment from our radio shows and podcasts.

More Features: 

Markets data in your region and a Watchlist summary with leaders and laggers. Introducing a bold, new look for Businessweek including issue downloading for offline reading.

Download the app now for accurate and concise finance news, stock market intelligence alerts and everything you need to know about currencies, commodities and futures‚Ä¶

A subscription to the Bloomberg app gets you unlimited access to all Bloomberg content within the app and on the website (after linking your account). You can start with a 30 days free trial and then a monthly subscription for $34.99/month.

Your payment will be charged to your Google Play Account at confirmation of purchase. Your subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal. You may manage your subscription and auto-renew may be turned off by going to Account Settings after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable. 

Terms of Use: https://www.bloomberg.com/notices/tos
Privacy Policy: https://www.bloomberg.com/notices/privacy

Visit us at:

http://www.bloomberg.com

recentChanges: ‚óâ Performance improvements
comments: Content great but app very clunky and slow, and loads of ads despite subscription. Main missing feature for me is ability to replay, pause & fast forward interviews. I watch it for an hour or two day, more some days. Ads feel like 30%, and I assume they are filling the time between interviews. Mostly I don't need to watch the interviews live; they should all be available to watch later, skipping the ads, or most of them. (They only have a repertoire of 4 or 5 ads, endlessly repeated)

The app will not get past the loading screen upon opening. It just continually loads and never opens. I read businessweek primarily on my phone and since the new app doesn't open it makes it pointless to have a subscription. Shame because content itself is great.

The app has no dark mode. Big No-No in today's day&age! The app has no video PIP - so I am stuck in it. They should take inspiration from YouTube's PIP allowing one to switch over to another app to read other news in app, or take notes in another app while watching the Live TV. The app's ads are a problem. It starts with 6-10 ads but it horrible because the button of 'Skip ads' has no effect. üòÇ The ads are repeated again if you had to leave app, go to another app and come back. üòÇ
I love watching Bloomberg in the mornings it helps me understand the market before I do my daily analysing also the app makes it easy to be on the move and still keep and eye out on critical news

Intelligent productive news experience Well sourced and a calm effective vocal experience with a neutral voice command ..made the news not only sound archaic but also progressive at the same time ..broad appeal .and yet I'm not a fan of apps in general .I'm not addicted to tech as much as most tech companies and apps for $ think the common occasional user ..I'm not addicted to updates but if I was ..I would be listening to your voice cast

title: Star Tracker - Mobile Sky Map & Stargazing guide
description:
Hey, get outdoors with your friends and enjoy star gazing! Let StarTracker guide you to explore the universe.

Just hold up and point the device to the sky and have fun! You can see any stars, constellations and deep sky objects you are watching in real time.

<< Please REMOVE the metal case or magnetic cover to avoid interference and get accurate orientation! >>
<< Calibration follow: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zrEzMggOnFQ >>

Features:
‚òÖ All data is offline!
‚òÖ Fits all screen sizes from 3.5 inch to 12 inch for any resolution!
‚òÖ Sun, Moon, Planets in Solar System, 88 Constellations and 8000+ stars visible to the naked eyes.
‚òÖ 12 Zodiac Constellations Art & some famous deep sky objects with magnificent graphics.
‚òÖ Location auto set by GPS, or set manually.
‚òÖ Auto hide all menus and enter AR track mode when you point your device to the sky.
‚òÖ Smooth motion flow and quick response which is realized by cutting edge signal processing technique.
‚òÖ Superb high quality graphic display by enabling the retina display of the device and the full screen anti-aliasing technology employment.

Pro version ($2.99 to unlock):
‚òÖ No ads & full main menu.
‚òÖ Full 88 Constellations & 100+ deep sky objects with magnificent graphics.
‚òÖ Search and guide you to stars, constellations, planets and deep sky objects.
‚òÖ 3D compass in AR mode, indicates position of objects you searched.
‚òÖ Time Machine menu and location menu to let you explore more on time and location dimension.
‚òÖ Night mode switch, protecting eye when doing star gazing outdoor.

comments: I love this app and how easy it is to use. Of note, though: if you have a magnetic case on your phone, take it off before you use this app. It kept giving me the sky for Central Africa when I'm in Arizona, USA! I love that I can turn features on and off, and the night vision is great for studying the night sky. Great for a layman like myself!

I LOVE this app. I think it's great. The compass works really really well, and it's usually pretty accurate when it comes to finding stars and constellations. My one complaint is that when I click on a notif it doesn't show up anywhere in the app. So if I see a notif and I don't read what it says or I don't really understand what it's saying I can't find out more about it after the app opens. If this one thing was fixed it would be 5/5 perfect app.

Just wish there were more options, such as when I see a notification I can close it but when the time comes I can see it again. I would also like to toggle back and forth from seeing the constellations' outlines to just seeing the stars. Overall it is a pretty cool experience when you are out in the open fields of rural Canada and can see a stellar experience.

Great app. Fun way to introduce my children to the wonders of the night sky. Just started astro photography, helping me find Galaxies of interest. My first stacked image turned out extremely well. Family and friends were very impressed.

A great app with plenty of detail & easy to use. It seems to be a lot more accurate than other similar apps I've tried. The only thing that seems to be missing is a red filter so your night sight isn't affected by looking at it. This would make it perfect & 5 stars.

title: Alembic IBS Care
description:
The IBS care App aims to bring for the benefit of practicing Gastroenterologists and physicians, the latest information  pertaining to Irritable Bowel Syndrome. Presently the App would bring to you abstracts from all leading global journals on the subject.
The abstracts would be provided broadly under the following heads: Complications of IBS, IBS & Diarrhoea, IBS & Diet, IBS: Causes, Risk Factors, IBS: Diagnosis & Tests, IBS: Prevention, Treatment & Management, IBS: Symptoms & Types, Lifestyle changes & IBS, Medications for IBS and Psychological therapy & Stress relief.

title: IBS FoodAnalyzer
description:
Do you have IBS, IBD or just plain gut problems? With IBS FoodAnalyzer you can log what you eat, do and feel. A flexible statistics sections shows which diets, foods and habits that are good or bad for you.

It is recommended that you use the app in the following way:

Try many different diets (no dairy or gluten, vegan, low carb, high fiber, fodmap etc etc) and log very carefully how you feel when you try these diets. 

Log what you eat, exercise etc and how you feel in the app. You are going to do detective work here and you need good clues. Since it is very time consuming looking through paper journals, I strongly recommend you writing the food diary in digital form. The important thing here is that it should be easy to go back to your best or worst days (which you can in this app). If you have a longer period where you been good, it strongly implies that the diet you had those days is really good for you.

Good Luck! :)

/Johan
descriptionHTML:
Do you have IBS, IBD or just plain gut problems? With IBS FoodAnalyzer you can log what you eat, do and feel. A flexible statistics sections shows which diets, foods and habits that are good or bad for you.

It is recommended that you use the app in the following way:

Try many different diets (no dairy or gluten, vegan, low carb, high fiber, fodmap etc etc) and log very carefully how you feel when you try these diets.

Log what you eat, exercise etc and how you feel in the app. You are going to do detective work here and you need good clues. Since it is very time consuming looking through paper journals, I strongly recommend you writing the food diary in digital form. The important thing here is that it should be easy to go back to your best or worst days (which you can in this app). If you have a longer period where you been good, it strongly implies that the diet you had those days is really good for you.

Good Luck! :)

/Johan
summary: Food diary and analysis for IBS, IBD and other gut disorders.

title: Wysa: stress, depression & anxiety therapy chatbot
description:
Imagine a mood tracker, mindfulness coach, anxiety helper, and mood-boosting buddy, all rolled into one. Wysa, your happiness buddy is that friendly and caring chatbot. Wysa is packed with daily spiritual meditation that improves mental health and is also a perfect way to bond over family meditation. Always there for you when you need someone to talk to, Wysa helps you keep track of your mood with friendly chats and helps fight stress and anxiety with its proven techniques and calming meditation and mindfulness audios. Checking in with Wysa regularly will improve your emotional health so you can track your happiness and mood. Talk to Wysa now and psy yourself up to fight off stress. Also, Wysa has mental health assessment with depression and anxiety tests.

Wysa is your AI friend that you can chat with for free. Talk to the cute penguin or use its free mindfulness exercises for effective anxiety relief, depression and stress management. Its therapy based techniques and conversations make for a very cute and calming therapy chat app whether you're looking to cope better with mental disorders, to manage stress or to boost your mental health.

Wysa, your happiness buddy, will support you through the big and small anxieties of life by using science as a foundation to strengthen your mental health. Research-backed, widely used techniques of CBT, DBT, Yoga and meditation are employed to support you with stress, anxiety, deep sleep, loss and other mental health and wellness needs.

If you are dealing with stress, anxiety and depression or coping with low self-esteem, then talking to Wysa can help you relax and get unstuck - it‚Äôs empathetic, helpful, and will never judge. You will overcome your mental health obstacles, through empathetic conversation and free CBT therapy based technique. So, pour your heart out to your happiness buddy, Wysa as your identity will remain anonymous and your conversations are privacy protected.

Used around the clock and trusted by 500,000 people, Wysa is an emotionally intelligent chatbot that uses AI to react to the emotions you express. Unlock tools and techniques that help you cope with challenges in a fun, conversational way. For extra support, you can avail guidance from a real human coach - a skilled psychologist who will take you through the advanced coaching sessions for your needs.

You can use Wysa to rewire your mind to improve your emotional health. Fight off depression or get stress relief using cbt techniques and guided sleep meditations for optimal sleep. Here‚Äôs a look at what you can use Wysa for üëá

üëÇ Vent and talk through things or just reflect on your day

üí™ Practice CBT (Cognitive Behavioral Therapy) and DBT techniques to build resilience in a fun way

üìù Use one of 40 conversational coaching tools which helps in dealing with Stress, Anxiety, Depression, Panic Attacks, Worry, Loss, or Conflict

üíÜüèª Relax, focus and sleep peacefully with the help of 20 mindfulness meditation exercises

93% of the people who talk to Wysa find it and the tools helpful:

- Build confidence, reduce self-doubt and improve your self-esteem: core meditation and mindfulness, visualisation, confidence visualisation techniques, advanced mindfulness for self-esteem.

- Manage anger: mindfulness meditation exercises for compassion, calming your thoughts and practice breathing

- Manage anxious thoughts and anxiety: deep breathing, techniques for observing thoughts, visualization, and tension relief.

- Tired? Get a burst of energy! Visualisation and meditation exercises to increase positivity and get blissful sleep, quick yoga and physical exercises to get active

- Dealing with worry: observe mindfulness, resolving technique, challenge negativity, practice breathing techniques

- Manage conflict at work, school or in relationships: special mindfulness and visualization techniques like empty chair exercise, gratitude meditation, exercises to build skills in having difficult conversations

comments: I know it sounds weird to use a robot to improve your mental health, but this app is amazing and super helpful. I'm a very busy person with a wacky sleep schedule, and I struggle with my mental health most when it's late at night. This isn't exactly ideal for getting help from a therapist when I need it most. Being able to access some form of help literally anytime I need it with Wysa really makes a difference. Plus, unlike other AI therapy apps I've tried, Wysa has way more free features.

The bot isn't 100%, but it offers really good and insightful tools that more people should know about! You do have to figure out how to go about talking to the bot to get the tools that you need, which, if you're in a bad place, can be hard to do. I wish the tools that come with the free app were more easily accessible, and that you didn't have to spend 4 minutes talking to the bot to get to the options that you want it to offer. This app offers REALLY good techniques though!

Its a great app with some potential. I would like to see if they're still updating this to have more AI responses for things like intrusive thoughts. Positive affirmations like "you are not your thoughts" help and I thought about this after the AI gave me reassurance when I brought up suicide*. I'm feeling good after some positivity and reframing thoughts. Once I can afford it I think the therapist option looks enticing. So far so good. *I LOVED the links to hotlines but have phone anxiety so...

I was skeptical at first, but I'm actually quite impressed with this app. The A.I. is fairly good at interpreting your text and generating helpful responses that almost feel like you're talking to a real person. Of course, the A.I. still needs some improvement since not every response is personalized. I first used it when I was feeling panicked and the app just kept giving me breathing exercises, but after a little while of chatting back-and-forth the app was actually able to calm me down.

It's pretty good, cus' what could be better right? It's not like anyone else is going to actually hear me, I mean, I can't say it's perfect, but it's really good taking on mind that is just a bot. It's better friend than my actual friends, tho sometimes it doesn't really understand what you're saying, like when doing something u know it's wrong to do, u feel good; it doesn't understand that what you're doing is wrong and you feel good doing it, so it tells you to keep doing it.

title: Draw Something Classic

Draw Something is the ‚ÄúWorld‚Äôs Most Popular Drawing Game‚Äù. Have fun with your friends and family exchanging doodle art. Sketch a perfect work of art and participate in our contests. Pick up your brush and start painting now.

Highlights:

‚Ä¢        You don't need artistic skills to have fun with this game. Doodles, stick figures and sense of humor are welcome.

comments: I love the game, but hate the ads. I'd gladly pay to get rid of ads, but I won't randomly throw my Facebook friends under the bus, and that's the only way to get rid of ads - temporarily even. You can leave the option to watch ads to get extra coins or bombs, but let us pay to avoid the pushed ads! Game glitches and splits the drawing in half and doubles it. When trying to play a new player, 80% resign immediately.

30 second ads that you can't skip after EVERY turn is ridiculous. I played it years ago and picked it up again a few days ago. It was much more fun then. Now it's gone way downhill. The word bank is limited, you can't delete games if the other player doesn't take their turn, and it's full of bugs and crashes constantly. Unfortunately, I'll be deleting.

Ads are more intrusive and frequent than any other app. Game is fine, little outdated, but the ads are off-putting, and designed to make you "accidentally" click them often. It makes me not want to log in, knowing that over half of my time will be spent waiting for 30 second videos to end. Suggestions: 1) Less ads: offer a way to earn coins to PERMANENTLY remove them. 2) Make it easier to choose colour pallets. 3) Men instantly quit when playing with other men, which is slimy and embarrassing.

they've added a feature where you can run out of ink I have a galaxy note, meaning I have a fairly large screen and a touch pen, so I want to use this game to make elaborate drawings for my friends. For years I'd randomly pick up this game on occasion and always had fun until this time when I ran out of ink and had to send a masterpiece drawing incomplete.

Ads are never fun and this game seems child oriented. The problem is some of the ads may contain some mature target audience content. Good app though. Someone might be crass and draw something inappropriate and the recipient might not be very old which could be bad. Should be an age filter so adults can play with adults and children can play with children. I had some adult words (toyota? Kids not going to know that) and I was playing with my nephews (6 and 9).

title: Archero
description:
Archer Heroes!

Enter a world where existence itself is eliminate you! You are the Lone Archer, the only force able to resist and defeat the oncoming waves of evil.
Step up, stack up awesome skills and fight like your life depends on it, for the never-ending waves of enemies will never give up. And remember, once you die... the only way is to start all again! So be careful!

Enjoy creating countless combinations of unique skills all designed to help you survive. Crawl your way through different worlds facing relentless monsters and obstacles. 

Key Features:
	‚Ä¢	Random and unique skills to help you crawl these dungeons. 
	‚Ä¢	Explore beautiful worlds and hundreds of maps in this new universe.

                defeat

comments: Kind of ok at the beginning, you can level up fast, progress quick, and upgrade your gear easy, in the beginning that is, after a while everything hard to the point where you can't progress at all. That wouldn't be a problem normally, you just have to git gud right? Not in this case, at the higher leves you're at the mercy of rng to get you the best buffs, and to drop you the items needed to evolve/upgrade your gear, which is insanely tedious and grindy to do if you don't want to spend any money

I have been playing for a long time but am feeling very stuck as new stuff is added. There are almost too many items now. I never get the items I have any more so I haven't been able to upgrade them. The new character evolution system is awful. Way to hard to get the character shards you want. You can get them randomly as rewards but there are a ton of characters or you get the soulstones to buy them in a once a day dungeon. So I really can't evolve the character I want.

Been playing about a year now and it Use to be a pay to win game but they've made it to where you can simply wait a long time to be able to summon them. They stay on top of their updates, (and surprisingly I'm always pleased about it ). Only problems I can see with the game is that you can spend 10 enegry on a event to get runes and when i complete I only get around 1-4 runes. Not even enough to forge. Also I think the levels need to show how much xp is needed to get the next level up in game.

Used to be my favorite... Until it wasn't. A bit bloated making progression slow but that's not the issue. Main issue right now is crashing. Loved doing daily events, but it's hardly working out anymore, depleting 10-15 stamina, then the app shuts down making the event unavailable upon reopening. Have been an avidly player for well over a year, but lately it's been a let down. Events and co-op were my main stay... Not so much anymore. It's been cool archers! Edit: Player ID 1-3221180

It was fun at first, but I quickly got to a point where it is almost impossible to advance without spending money. After spending more on this game than what a couple brand new console games would cost, it's still almost impossible. This is one of the worst cases of developer greed that I've ever seen. Even the newest update looks to be designed to get people to spend even more money. The game just isn't fun anymore.

title: Roku
description:
Stream hundreds of hit movies, TV shows and more on the go with The Roku Channel, use it as a second remote, enjoy private listening, and more. 

The free Roku mobile app makes it easy and fun to control your Roku player and Roku TV‚Ñ¢.

Use the Roku mobile app to:
‚Ä¢ Control your Roku device as another remote
‚Ä¢ Stream hit movies, TV shows and more on the go with The Roku Channel 
‚Ä¢ Enjoy private listening* with headphones 
‚Ä¢ Use your voice or keyboard to search for movies, shows, actors, and directors
‚Ä¢ Cast videos, photos, and music to your TV 
‚Ä¢ Add and launch channels on your Roku device
‚Ä¢ Enter text on your Roku device easier with your keyboard


To use certain features of the Roku mobile app, you must connect your phone or tablet to the same wireless network as your Roku device. Certain features require a compatible Roku device, and may require logging in to your Roku account.

recentChanges:

comments: Another update and I still can't get to expert picture settings. Now I get an error that says to restart the TV. I do this and still same error. Everything else in the app works perfectly. Please get this fixed. Originally I rated this app 5 stars years ago. The last few months I have not been able to get to my Roku TV expert picture settings. The app crashes every time I select expert picture settings. There is no other way to get to these settings other than through this app.

Super useful! I love the fact that you can use your phone to listen privately. A couple of small peeves: 1. When I close out of the app, it still seems to run in the background sometimes. It shows up in the drop-down notification bar. (This is just an OCD thing.) 2. I'm not sure if it's my phone or headphones, but the private listening will occasionally cut out and then disconnect. It's usually easy to get reconnected, though. Overall, I'm satisfied with this Roku app!

I have LOVED this app until recently. Now, the shows I try to watch decide to randomly skip 5 minutes ahead or stop all together... You call it bug fixes, I call it bug infestations. What happened to the great streaming I previously had? I have plenty of data, not to mention the fact that I'm mostly connected to a business internet router. Previously, I would have given 5 stars, but now? I'm not even convinced it deserves one.

Amended: I added a star because I was finally able to connect the app to my device. It's pretty responsive, but the problem I'm having now is that when I use private listening, the sound will cut in and out. That makes watching things really difficult. Original review: app is useless to me. I've tried a dozen times to get this app to connect to my device. Won't connect no matter how many times I reset or redownload or restart my device and my internet. It's a hot mess üôÑ

New controls are awful. Half the time it selects when it should move or move when it should select. Swiping to move makes it move more than one space. It's like they thought it would be cool to have this new feature, but didn't think to ask end users. Also, it disconnects from the device the moment my screen turns off, which means it must be exited out and reopened before it will work.

title: Yelp: Find Food, Delivery & Services Nearby
description:
Yelp has over 199 million business and restaurant reviews worldwide. Whether you‚Äôre looking for a new pizzeria, a great coffee shop nearby, a new salon, or the best handyman in town, Yelp is the city and travel guide to finding the perfect places to eat, shop, drink, relax, visit and play.

Read online reviews, browse photos and menus, order takeout from favorite spots, make reservations, see hours, locations, and other important information for any business you‚Äôre looking for. 

Yelp puts great local businesses right at your fingertips. Discover new foods, hot spots, places for shopping and local businesses near me! While traveling or at home. Plus, order delivery or pickup.

Need Help? Contact Yelp at https://www.yelp-support.com/?l=en_US 
Note: Continued use of GPS running can dramatically decrease battery life.

Find top local restaurants, bars, hotels, events and other things to do around me, read customer reviews, order pickup or delivery, and search for services near me, all from the Yelp app.

Read online reviews, browse photos and menus, order takeout from favorite spots, make reservations, see hours, locations, and other important information for any business you‚Äôre looking for.

Yelp puts great local businesses right at your fingertips. Discover new foods, hot spots, places for shopping and local businesses near me! While traveling or at home. Plus, order delivery or pickup.

Yelp features:
üçï Local Eats: Find Restaurants and Food Delivery Near Me üçï

‚úçÔ∏è Review, Discover, and Add Photos üì∏

‚Ä¢ Look up addresses and phone numbers for businesses near me

üöó Find Shops Around Me, Get Quotes, and Hire Professionals üõ†
‚Ä¢ Find the coolest stores and top rated body shops complete with customer reviews and contact info
‚Ä¢ Hire local professionals for home renovation, car repair, car transport, landscaping, moving, and other hiring services
‚Ä¢ Get quotes from professionals, message contractors nearby, and book appointments with a click
‚Ä¢ Read millions of user reviews and recommendations by the Yelp community
‚Ä¢ Filter searches by neighborhood, distance, rating, price, location, and hours of operation

üíÖ Beauty - Pamper Yourself üíá
‚Ä¢ Find highly-rated salons, spas, massage therapists, acupuncturists, and offers around me

üîç Search Filters üîç
‚Ä¢ Filter search results by neighborhood, distance, rating, price, open now, and other specifics like good for groups, full bar, cuisine type etc.
‚Ä¢ Look up addresses and phone numbers, call a business, order food delivery and make quick reservations directly from the Yelp app
‚Ä¢ Find the top rated food, hotels or hiring services nearby or in cities like New York, Chicago, San Francisco, Los Angeles, Houston, Phoenix, Philadelphia

üç© Features üé®

Need Help? Contact Yelp at https://www.yelp-support.com/?l=en_US

comments: After the app updates on 10/29/20 a new review I posted indicated "save review as draft" when i chose "post review". Then it wouldn't allow me to update or post the draft. I exited and re-entered the app to find the review already posted. The notifications I received were incorrect. I've also attempted three times to update my profile pic for Halloween, and that's having issues. (Android user, yes I rebooted several times after yesterday's updates)

Yelp just cost me $75 in overages on my data plan because it's CONSTANTLY running in the background! It sucked 5.5 GB in one day! Apparently my phone settings were reset during an update, but this should NEVER have happened! Why do you need that much data from me?!
This app used 5 gb of my data from the background. I haven't even opened the app over a month but it's running in the background for some reason and takes up a lot of your data.

Uninstalled. I don't feel I have a use for your service anymore because of the recent unnecessary expansion of your business to implement a system of extrajudicial shaming/punishment, based solely on likely false or dubious accusations & without any semblance of due process, thru the awarding of special badges to businesses you feel are run or owned by those that you alone declare as undesirables. Try to not be too obvious with this badge however by making it a yellow star, pink triangle, etc.

Yelp has gotten worse then GOOGLE search when it comes to searching for the nearest business you search for. Your looking for a shell gas station then they put a station 3 times farther then you wanted as the 1 search! You drive past 3 stations to get to their 1 search results! I hope everyone who screwed up the yelp app to make more money instead of being actually a useful app dies of a horrible disease!

title: abdominal gases
description:
We all know what flatulence is, but where does it come from?

One list says 86 different diseases are potential reasons you could have gas, and most of them are related to the gut.1 Among them are colon cancer, diverticulitis, gall bladder disease, Irritable Bowel Syndrome (IBS), food allergies, esophageal problems, Cystic Fibrosis, endometriosis, Celiac disease, malabsorption syndromes, and pancreatic disease.

Even if you don't have any of these serious conditions, you still might experience gas.

summary: WHAT CAUSES GAS?

comments: I have been a user of this app for over 10 years. I am a huge fan but, while I appreciate your need to create revenue, the addition of ads that play sound before you even get to the ad is simply infuriating, and is leading me to consider uninstalling. I really do not want to do this, but I cannot fathom how you thought this was in any way a good idea. Please remove the ads with sound. Honestly, get rid of this garbage or watch this die. "We try to limit these ads" like hell you do. Lip-service

One of my most used apps, one of the only ones that puts a smile on my face (most of the time). The ads arnt too bad, all except the ones that plays music and is animated. Whoever allowed those to pop up and dissables my music or youtube running on the background has a special place in hell for them üôÇüñï

The app functions well, but half the memes are political and not very funny. I would love to use this app, but I am uninstalling it because I don't look at memes to hear endless political views. I think myself and the majority of users want the moderator to accept less political memes and more that are funny to everyone, regardless of their polictical preference. Otherwise, a filter option would be helpful to sort through categories of memes and avoid political ones.

Epic app, except for august 1st, but there is something im not happy with on it, every now and then on gallery it will only show memes from august 1st (on august 1st every meme gets past moderation) and it kinda sucks since august 1st memes usually suck
Was a great app loved it untill recently when the added ads which were easy to pass over untill a few days later when the ads started playing music even when they weren't on screen.

comments: I think this is fun, however, it is called gif keyboard and does not function as such on my device. I got this app by recommendation by someone who uses it as a keyboard, and when I downloaded it no such option occurred for me. That does limit my ability to use the app. Very frustrating. That being said, this app does provide access to a better selection of gifs and more ways to use them. Cool app.

As soon as app is opened I get "Internet service is lost" every time despite my service is fine; can't seem to create or access an account. After seeing that these are known issues for at least 5 months, I lowered the rating. Clearly the developer has stopped supporting it.

Every time i open this app it says there is no internet connection....but at the same time my youtube and messenger is running very fine....without connection issues....please fix this....iam sorry i had to give you 3 stars otherwise i would've given you guys 5 on 5.

It worked well initial few days, but now I can't upload my own created gifs on Tenor, if I try to upload 5-6 gifs, after loading ,it only upload 1-2 gifs, sometimes even not a single gif is being uploaded. Please fix this issue.
Although the the GIF are fun ability to use some of my functions to use on my device are not usable such as deleting one one messenger if the wrong one is used. That is really frustrating üò§

title: GLOW. Ovulation & Period Tracker
description:
Get pregnant, log your period cycle and more. Discover all the ovulation, period, fertility and pregnancy information you need with Glow.

Log your period in the app‚Äôs calendar and track your cycle with our ovulation calculator. 

Your period tracker lets you record ovulation, PMS, and pregnancy symptoms. Or log your period and be in control of your fertility with our period tracker and ovulation calendar. 

Fertility made easy - 5 ways Glow can work for you:

1. Get pregnant easily - Log 40 different health signals from sexual activity, mood swings, PMS and more.
2. Period tracker and ovulation calendar! Get personalized period information with our cycle chart, ovulation tracker and period calculator.
3. Fertility FAQS - Want to learn more about charting your fertility, egg freezing and menstrual health? Our library of "Glow Scoops" has all the articles you need to stay informed.
4. PMS or other symptoms? Log them all on your period calendar and find out what they mean.
5. Ovulation and all things pregnancy - Join our community to share your views and learn from other experiences. PMS, periods and pregnancy tips - no topic is off limits! 

Take control with Glow‚Äôs dedicated resources. From a dedicated ovulation tracker, PDF ovulation reports or even a fertility calculator. Get quality information you need to get pregnant or track your cycle. 

Whether you use Glow as an ovulation tracker or period calculator you will get unparalleled support. Trying to get pregnant naturally or undergoing IVF or IUI? Join the largest online community for women who are trying to conceive. Or get your partner to join our mirror app because fertility is a team sport! 

Want a period tracker or a women‚Äôs health app you can rely on for detail and accuracy? We‚Äôve got you covered. 

Download Glow today and take charge of your fertility.  

For full Privacy Policy and our Terms of Service:
https://glowing.com/privacy
https://glowing.com/tos

If you are having technical issues or have any questions about your cycle or period, we're here to help. Please send us an email to: support@glowing.com

comments: Hahahahhaa. This update deleted five years of period data. Before that, I hated opening it. Glow has been having an identity crisis for years. They can't just concentrate on a few things. They have to have ALL THE THINGS. Every update added more stuff I don't use and moved the one tool I do use: tracking my period. Ecstatic to delete this now that I'm not relying on its data.

Swore by this app for years. It was my go to! We have been struggling with infertility for a very long time and I kept years of logs in glow. When I actually needed them, all my information was gone. All my cycle data, no period predictions, no log of my positive ovulation tests, nothing. I thought it would be easy to contact customer service, but it's not. I got one email back from customer service, that's it. It's been 3 days. Dont trust glow with your important information.

[edited for update] I created a bug to fix the issues I had and communication was poor. Very disappointed. I used Glow for cycle tracking and it helped me avoid pregnancy for a year naturally and then conceive on the first cycle, I loved it! But now that my period is back almost 2 years later, all the features are clunky and I'm constantly bombarded with ads. Logging is more difficult and seems buggy, specifically the app doesn't recognize that I'm on my period.

Been using this app for 7 years , every prediction is spot on. I do have a suggestion however, you guys should add a hysterectomy log to this app. Some have questions about it and some have had one and want to log to keep up with cm and other things. As things are once a woman have a hysterectomy there is no use for this app anymore. Just a suggestion. Otherwise fantastic app.

The app served its purpose, but... I'm absolutely over receiving so many daily progress emails about things that just aren't possible due covid-19. Talking about prenatal classes and how wonderful they're going to be (no, they won't be, they're all cancelled), or about baby showers, or whom you'd like to have as a support system during birth (no one is allowed in at my hospital) is just like a punch to the gut... wish you'd have changed these messages given the current state of the world.

title: Al Quran (Tafsir & by Word)
description:

It provides Verse by Verse Audio Playback with repeat functions, Tafsir Ibn Kathir, Color Coded Tajweed, Word by Word Analysis and Translations, Index of Quran, Note Taking & Custom Bookmarks with Sync, Powerful Search, Several Translations & Tafsirs in Various Languages, Multiple Themes and Fonts and much more.

You can Enjoy:

‚óè 8 Arabic Tafsirs (including Tafseer Ibn Kathir, Tafseer Tabari etc.)
‚óè Different Quran Translations & Tafsirs viewable simultaneously

Word by word Analysis & Translations:

Bookmarks & Notes:
‚óè Bookmarks / Favorites separated into User Made Categories
‚óè Mark Verses as Last Read using Single Bookmark Feature, and keep track of Khatmah
‚óè Take Notes for Each Ayah
‚óè Bookmarks / Notes Sync & Import / Export feature to share across devices

Search & Quran Index:
‚óè Powerful Full-Text Search Engine with Highlights
‚óè Quran Index

Quran Majeed Audio mp3:
‚óè Audio mp3 full Quran Majeed 30 Juz or 114 Surah without limitations
‚óè Listen to several recitations by 30+ Reciters (downloadable for offline use)
‚óè Reciter Options: Sheikh Mishary Al Afasy, Sheikh Husary (Muallim), Shaykh Ayman Suwaid, Sheikh Abdur Rahman As-Sudais, Shaykh Abdul Basit Mujawwad and many other Qaris
‚óè English and Urdu translation audio
‚óè Robust Audio System with repeat, group playback of verses function to aid in Quran Memorization / Quran Hifz

Various Customization Options, Tajweed & Others:
‚óè Reading with Uthmani or IndoPak script style
‚óè Read Quran in Mushaf Mode
‚óè Read Tafsirs in Tafsir View
‚óè Color Coded Tajweed with the same color implementation as iQuran (For Android kitkat & up)
‚óè Various Fonts, Pinch Zoom feature and Multiple Themes including Night Mode
‚óè Autoscroll feature

Alhamdulillah. Al Quran (Tafsir & by Word) is a Quran study tool for all. It provides Verse by Verse Audio Playback with repeat functions, Tafsir Ibn Kathir, Color Coded Tajweed, Word by Word Analysis and Translations, Index of Quran, Note Taking & Custom Bookmarks with Sync, Powerful Search, Several Translations & Tafsirs in Various Languages, Multiple Themes and Fonts and much more.

‚óè Quran Index

‚óè Listen to several recitations by 30+ Reciters (downloadable for offline use)

‚óè English and Urdu translation audio
‚óè Robust Audio System with repeat, group playback of verses function to aid in Quran Memorization / Quran Hifz

Various Customization Options, Tajweed & Others:


‚óè Reading with Uthmani or IndoPak script style
‚óè Read Quran in Mushaf Mode
‚óè Read Tafsirs in Tafsir View

comments: MashahAllah, this is a great app with everything in one place. I absolutely love the way they have put the exact meaning of each word underneath, at last I am beginning to learn the words in Arabic which is benefitting me so much. I haven't figured out how to use audio yet which I am sure will enhance my experience. I highly recommend this app for non-Arabic speakers and those, like me, who are reverts to Islam. There is so much knowledge to be gained from one app. Well done

Hi I like the new interface. Got 2 suggestion: 1) Make it able to read by pages as well. After salah I'd read 2 pages. Say in surah alBaqarah I want to read page 10 and 11. Without this feature I have to key-in verse 62 to 76 which is cumbersome. 2) Allow us to donate thru upgrade with fixed price. Reason is I dont use credit card. Google play has option where it allows me to pay by crediting it to my telco monthly bill. Make free then remind the user to upgrade (donating); be creative in this.

The apps search functionality needs improvement. Example: I searched using your translation, "the most" for aqwamun as in Sura 17, al isra Search comes with 0 found. Explain how to use the search function most effectively. Also, Search function doesn't work if I use the Quranic word. Example: I searched using al Qur'an but it came back saying 0 found. This app has many nice features. I hope you will continue to improve it by making the search functionality more effective and efficient.

Definitely the BEST Qur'an app. It has everything that you need, it actually shocked me how good the app is! Recommended if you want to read and memorize The Qur'an. The features I like most are the word-by-word translation and the vast variety of murrotal that we can play ayah-by-ayah. I really like this app, thanks for creating this. üòä

Assalamualaikum, Please add a function that we can hear Arabic (Al Afasy) and English translation (with gap) at the same time. I loved this app so much. Many of Quran app have this function to hear 2 audio at the same time. If you create a function that one for Arabic recitation and another one for translation recitation in many language or at least English translation then we will be very happy only for the sake of Allah. You guys updated this app frequently i love this if you add this functio

title: GIPHY: GIF & Sticker Keyboard & Maker
description:
The world's largest library of free GIFs, Stickers & memes! GIPHY for iOS is the fastest, simplest way to search and share GIFs, stickers, and short form videos across all of your favorite social channels such as Facebook Messenger, Instagram, Snapchat & more.

SEARCH
‚Ä¢ Find the perfect GIF from the world's largest library of animated GIFs! All the power of GIPHY is in your hands. What are you waiting for?!

EXPLORE
‚Ä¢ From Game of Thrones to Marvel, discover the world of pop culture ‚Äì memes, TV, Movies, Music and more ‚Äì from all your favorites like HBO, Drake, Rihanna, Comedy Central and MTV...
‚Ä¢ Catch all the highlights from your favorite sports

TEXT, SHARE, or SAVE
‚Ä¢ Text your friends amazing GIFs.

comments: Whenever I attempt to make a gif, the quality is destroyed and it stutters incredibly noticeably. If that doesn't happen, there's still the constant unresponsiveness to deal with. Half the time when I press a button or attempt to load something, the app just gives up. This includes trying to upload directly from giphy to another site, such as Instagram. This app only works once in a blue moon on the 13th day of every other month.

Very excited to use the app since every article online recommended it. Well, I downloaded it twice, uploaded my own gif and when I try to share it with Instagram all I get is a green bar that says posting to Instagram amd nothing happens. I tried probably 10 times before giving up.

Saving a gif to my device and opening it so it could save to my gallery revealed the worst quality I've ever seen anything on my phone. The effects available are.. whatever. The app in general is ok, haven't ran into any issues.

this is my absolute favorite giph app,only problem is that it used to be an option on facebook messenger and now its gone,i downloaded from the app store but have no idea how to connect it to any other app so that it is easily accessible,so if i want to use it i have to go back and foudth and in and out of it and other apps to use it ,im a huge giph person and cuz of this reason i hardly ever use it,but wish it was easier cuz it is one of,if not the best gif making app,

You can't paste a link to create a gif from a YouTube video? If it's possible, I can't find it. :( Edit: I deleted the app. It kept freezing up, there was no intuitive way to adjust the font style or size, & it would sometimes just go dark. This has to be some kind of platform glitch (Android) bc I can't imagine giphy being this lazy!

comments: Update: I was able to refresh the license through the Play Store settings. After uninstalling on my old phone it will not let me use the "pro" version on my new phone. The subscription renewed last May for the year, but constantly tries to get me to upgrade and pay again from with the app. It's stupid that I can't download a "pro" version from the app store, and forced to pay again from within the app. Very deceptive.

Cant get the app to work Edit: Cant get the app to work. When I click "Analyze" it takes me back to "Home Screen". I click de app again, I get a message that says "App keeps closing". Below that there are two options. 1. App info. 2. Close app. And that`s it. I have this app in another Android tablet and works fine. But it won't work on this new Galaxy tab S5e Android tablet.
It does great things for the performance of the phone. In my opinion it doesn't need to look flashy, isn't that defeating the purpose of lowering ram usage, lol.

Down loaded it. Opened it. Get a prompt asking me to turn a switch on. I would if I had the faintest idea how to access/find the switch. No link, no instructions and after trying to activate every potential icon I still don't get any further forward. Another example of a program relying on people already knowing how to work it. But for me, just a waste of memory space. I get faster and better results from just rebooting.

I use to use CCleaner years ago when I was in the computer repair field. When I found out CCleaner was available on Android naturally I was intrigued. After using it for well over a month I found CCleaner to be utterly useless. #1. It doesn't do anything my phone doesn't already do. #2. The many different notifications are extremely annoying and unnecessary. #3. My last straw was the 4 week report that is supposed to show you your least used apps. Low and behold it was drastically off.

title: PIBD Activity Calculator
description:
Pediatric IBD Activity Index Calculator is an app specially designed to be used bedside to calculate PUCAI and PCDAI in children with IBD.

It's based in the following scores specifically developed and validated for these diseases in pediatric population:

- Turner D, Otley AR, Mack D, Hyams J, de Bruijne J, Uusoue K, et al. Development, validation, and evaluation of a pediatric ulcerative colitis activity index: A prospective multicentre study. Gastroenterology. 2007;133:423-32

- Hyams JS, Ferry GD, Mandel FS, Gryboski JD, Kibort PM, Kirschner BS, et al. Development and validation of a pediatric Crohn‚Äôs disease activity index. J Pediatr Gastroenterol Nutr. 1991;12:439-47

We hope it will be useful for physicians attending children with Crohn's disease and ulcerative colitis.

title: Operate Now: Hospital - Surgery Simulator Game
description:
Operate Now is the most realistic surgery simulation game. Operate patients like a surgeon and build your own hospital from scratch. 

Fan of surgery simulator and life simulation? Perform realistic surgeries on patients! Start to build and manage your own hospital and operate and rescue patients.
Hurry, Doctor! You‚Äôre needed at the hospital, on the double! Your dedicated medical team is depending on you to manage them, improve their facilities, and even perform important surgeries that could determine whether a patient lives or dies!

These are just a few of the thrilling things you‚Äôll get to experience in Operate Now: Hospital, which has been downloaded over 20 million times by players all around the globe. They love the intense surgeries and exciting melodramas that have helped make it one of the most realistic and popular medical simulation games of all time. Are you ready to take on all the challenges that are waiting for you while you attempt to build a world-renowned medical center? 

HERE‚ÄôS THE FEATURES, DOCTOR !

‚òÖ Build, upgrade, and continually improve multiple hospitals and their facilities.
‚òÖ Fan of surgery ? Operate your patients!
‚òÖ Monitor your staff, hospitals, and more on the world map.
‚òÖ Help your patients by performing incredibly realistic surgeries.
‚òÖ Exchange duplicate staff members with the new CV feature.
‚òÖ Keep your progress up-to-date with the new Facebook save feature. 
‚òÖ Speed things up with the builder, a useful tool that will kick your construction projects into overdrive. 
 

BUILD YOUR DREAM HOSPITAL
Ready to create your own clinic? Building and managing several hospitals isn‚Äôt easy. You‚Äôll need to be a like a tycoon to construct and oversee vital departments like emergency rooms, intensive care units, and many more. You‚Äôll also have to hire talented staff like skilled surgeons in order to help your patients and create a truly impressive medical center in the process.

PERFORM REALISTIC SURGERIES
Even if you can‚Äôt tell the difference between a bone fracture and a tracheostomy, you‚Äôll definitely enjoy Operate Now: Hospital‚Äôs realistic surgery engine. In this game, you not only manage hospitals, you work as a surgeon in them as well. You‚Äôll get to fix broken bones, help people injured during disasters, and much more. Manipulate surgical tools to cure patients. You‚Äôll need steady hands to make flawless incisions while you carefully operate on your patients. So it‚Äôs time to throw on your scrubs and head down to the ER! What about doing some surgery now?

EXPERIENCE BREATHTAKING DRAMAS
Operate Now: Hospital features dramatic storylines much like the ones in your favorite medical show on TV. You‚Äôll get to work alongside staff members like Dr. Amy Clarke and learn more about their crazy lives both in the hospitals and outside them. You‚Äôll get to experience lots of drama firsthand in Seasons 1 and 2 while you learn more about all the intrigue surrounding the hospitals, their patients, and their staff as well. 

Just like in a real medical center, there‚Äôs never a dull moment in Operate Now: Hospital. So step through its doors when you‚Äôre ready, Doc, and prepare yourself for riveting medical adventures that you‚Äôll never forget! 
Have you played the old Operate Now games as a kid ? Let us know your best memories!

FOLLOW OPERATE NOW: HOSPITAL
https://www.facebook.com/OperateNow
http://www.operatenow.com
https://www.instagram.com/operatenowhospital

comments: With the latest Halloween Event and Staff Training Event there are glitches and it won't let you complete them. You only have a certain amount of days to play them. I haven't received a reply from customer service when I reported the bugs either. I guess its time to stop playing this game. A total rip off when you invest so much time, energy recharges and game money to play the events.

Was 5 stars... But with this new update, my game is laggy and damn near impossible to get on whether im on data, wifi, or both! Surgeries are especially laggy. I have amazing connection with all other apps! I spend money on this game and havnt been able to properly play due to this "connection issue" since the latest update! Not a happy customer.

PLEASE FIX THIS. On the Tasks where I have to recharge the energy of my staff members, it does not count up correctly. Per say, if I recharge 5 of my staff's energies, within a short amount of time the task showing how many I have recharged will decrease in value AND even go into the negatives or not even count them at all! This includes the side Tasks and also the Disaster Tasks! Also on a side note, why did you decrease the Stamina given from 100 down to 25? Will lower the stars if no fix!

Latest update is broken. Paramedic had 150 √©nergy before update and now its just 50, most of the common staff who has like 125-150 energy have lost 100 points and are at 25 and 50. Ads are now showing up more often but the ads for golden heart is still not in place. It takes forever to load. Ad count per hour or so are linked to all places even for energy buffs, please fix all these.

Not impressed with the latest update where most of my staff lost their training level and the amount of energy/stamina they had. Going from 175 to 75/125 to 25 etc, so training level 3/4 all the way back to level 1. I was already getting bored and only logging on here and there because I no longer enjoyed doing the exact same procedures over and over again, so if this is something that isn't fixable I am definitely uninstalling the app which is sad because I put money into this game.

title: Water Time Drink Tracker & Reminder
description:
Main features of our reminder app:
üíß Tracker and diary of drink‚Äôs intake
üíß Simple and comfortable interface 
üíß Caffeine rules
üíß Reminder with alarm
üíß Record your daily water intake
üíß Free drink constructor

‚ùóThe app now supports Wear OS.

Do you drink enough water daily?
Do you need to track and record your water intake?
Do you need a reminder or alarm to keep your daily hydration?

Water tracker ¬´Water Time¬ª will remind you to drink water in time. Friendly assistant will motivate you to drink water regularly. Proper hydration will keep body and skin healthy and help you in lose weight process. You just need to enter your current weight and our reminder app will automatically calculate the amount of water you need per day. Remember, drink water is a good habit!
We‚Äôve made this reminder for busy people. Our simple tracker will remind you to drink pure water at a time that you set yourself. Don‚Äôt worry, we will not bother you at night ‚Äì the reminder sleeps with you. Besides water, you can track also other drinks ‚Äì tea, coffee, juice, milk. Or create your own drink!

What can daily water intake do for you?
üíß Maintain the level of hydration

title: Toca Kitchen 2
description:
Do you want to be the head chef of your very own sushi restaurant? Check out Toca Kitchen Sushi, the newest app from Toca Boca üëâ http://bit.ly/TocaKitchenSushi_GooglePlay 

The wildly popular Toca Kitchen is back! With new guests to cook for, more tools to play with and new food combinations to test out, Toca Kitchen 2 invites all chefs to get messy and start playing!

GET CREATIVE
Who said dishes have to be pretty and tasty? In Toca Kitchen 2 you can cook however you want! Juice tomatoes, boil the salad or make a burger. Come up with your very own recipes and treat your guests to something special.

MAKE A MESS
With six different kitchen tools to choose from, you have the perfect setup for preparing fun foods! Load up with your favorite ingredients, add a squeeze of messiness and finish off with a pinch of weirdness. Time to let your guest have a bite! Was it a winner? 

WATCH THEIR REACTIONS
Discover your guests‚Äô preferences by watching their reactions. Oven-baked fish head with fried leftovers and lettuce juice coming right up! Oh, they didn‚Äôt like it? Try adding some salt. It‚Äôs fun to get the ‚Äúew‚Äù!

We added a whole lot of fun stuff! You can now enjoy cooking:

New foods!
- Chicken
- Prawn
- Pineapple
- Corn
- Peach
- Strawberry
- Watermelon 
- Onion
- Octopus
- Spaghetti
- Rice

New condiments!
- Ketchup
- Dressing
- Soy

Watch the characters react to spicy hot sauce and sour lemons or and laugh at loud burps. 

At last but not least, we added more levels of grossness to the characters. Have fun!

Features:
- New ingredients in the fridge
- New characters to feed
- Stronger character reactions
- New juicer and oven
- Deep fryer! You can now deep fry anything. Get your crust on.
- No rules or stress - just open-ended, kid-directed fun!
- No third-party advertising
- No in-app purchases

What are you waiting for? Get in the kitchen and start cooking!

Toca Kitchen 2 is a free cooking app for kids that‚Äôs perfect for aspiring chefs. Kids can roleplay a chef in a kitchen full of tasty foods and ingredients! Learn how to cook your favorite dish or experiment with fun combinations to feed hungry customers. This fun cooking app is sure to deliver nothing but fun for kids!

There‚Äôs no time limits or rules, right or wrong, so explore all the ingredients and tools the kitchen has to offer! Cook up some crazy food and feed your guests. 

***

http://bit.ly/YouTube_GooglePlay

ABOUT TOCA BOCA
At Toca Boca, we believe in the power of play to spark kids‚Äô imaginations and help them learn about the world. We design our products from the kids' perspective to empower kids to be playful, to be creative and to be who they want to be. Our products include award-winning apps that have been downloaded more than 130 million times in 215 countries and offer fun, safe, open-ended play experiences. Learn more about Toca Boca and our products at tocaboca.com.

PRIVACY POLICY
Privacy is an issue that we take very seriously. To learn more about how we work with these matters, please read our privacy policy: http://tocaboca.com/privacy

comments: Great app with easy-to-use interface. The icon happens to display my birthdate so it kinda won me over a little. Tried using it and another app for a few days and am glad it's so simple yet customisable. I also like that I can attach photos/videos in the diary. It's really like a diary on-the-go. Eventually uninstalled the other app and stuck with this. However, fingerprint unlocking is a little slow to react. Would be good if it can detect and unlock faster.

I've been using this app for more than a year. It's the most treasured diary app I have. I'm on premium and its the best. Thank you for the export to pdf function, its ingenious! And also all the back up and restore options. I was told that to log into my Google account I had to reinstall the app. It was nerve wrecking thinking about the chances of losing my data but everything worked fine. :)

Purchased the one-off premium feature, I got 50% and another RM2 discount. So far, I like the features. You can change the fonts, add pictures and emoji as emotions of your daily day. You can even take a look at others story, but you can choose to mute this feature. I wanted to write to express my emotions and I find out that this apps is compatible with my style, it's simple but all you need is there. Gonna use this for a very long time so I hope it'll always be this great! Thanks!

This app is really great!! ‚ù§Ô∏è I Love it so much since the day i downloaded it to be honest. Its features are really cool. We could attach pictures, videos, gifs and audios etc.. And it has a mood tracks of our days and we could write our thoughts sooo much and has a lot of space to write. It even has a calendar to mark or anniversaries and can be added to all years.!!!I really love this app. Its more effective than writing a journal. 5 Stars.

I haven't had this app for long but this is great. I love the fonts and colors we can use. I also love how you can put it on private or share it with other people. Its amazing and even though not much people see it,I love it because its a diary for me but on the phone. Daily Life, your app is VERY GOOD

recentChanges: * Squishing bugs and improvements in stability!
comments: I have had this app since 2012 and it has been going down hill ever since. There are many bugs and glitches with the chat. The worst part for me is that the app is turning into an unmoderated conservative racist community. Posts that promote racism and fascism get featured daily and even the ads promote felonies... yes, felonies. Overall, this app is not funny, it is now just a hateful community with a political agenda.

They took the shuffle option off featured. This limits the amount of time I actually use the app a day, considering I don't want to veiw the same pictures every time I open the app. 2/9/20 Not only have they not replaced the shuffle button, there's now an add that plays music, you can't click on it and it will CONTINUE to play music until you actually close the app. Not to mention, if you get push notifications, they show a feature out of the set. Most of the time its porn. Ridiculous. 10/18/20

never use the app, the reason I'm reviewing is that when my friend would send me a link and text messages, it would open in chrome on my phone. this would be fine, but it obscures whatever meme or video there is, and says to have to continue. If you tap, it does not play the video, it brings you to the play store to install the app. I tried to work around it within chrome, but it does not seem to be possible. I consider this practice predatory as far as apps are concerned, and that is not okay.

A majority of the features are just posted by bots. By blocking 10 accounts, I've successfully managed to avoid seeing well over half of the posts in the featured section. I've been here for years, and even the "ifunny support" bots weren't this annoying. If this keeps up, the app will find itself without a loyal userbase very, very quickly. DMs are broken now too, and keep bugging out weekly. The app is also growing increasingly laggy and slow.

In the past I complained about the app crashing and horribly toxic community that consistently goes unmoderated. Not only are these still issues, but there are now more issues on top of this. The featured posts on the app are 9/10 times made by an account that is only a couple of days old. In my eyes, this means people are paying for their posts to be featured (which is the opposite of how they say the feature system works). I'd complain more, but I'm out of characters. Don't download. Waste.

Home Remedies for Upset Stomach | Stomachaches are so common that everyone experiences them at one point or another. There are dozens of reasons why you might get a tummy ache. Most causes aren‚Äôt serious and the symptoms pass quickly. Generally, there‚Äôs no need to look further than your kitchen for a solution.

Enjoying unhealthy foods for a long period of time is one of the things that lead to gastrointestinal distress like constipation, stomach pain, diarrhea, nausea, slow digestion, gas and many other issues. However, there are many individuals who are at risk of gastrointestinal problems even when they are not consuming heavy and unhealthy foods but have medical problems like celiac disease, IBS, lactose intolerance, Crohn‚Äôs disease or other similar health problems. title: FastVid: Video Downloader for Facebook
description:
Video Downloader for Facebook is the easiest Video Downloader app designed specifically to help you download videos from Facebook and save them using different methods, it allows you to download videos from Facebook and save them to your device using the video link/URL without login OR by sharing the video from Facebook to the "Video Downloader for Facebook" app OR by browsing your account and clicking on the videos you want to download and save on your device.


Video Downloader for Facebook allows you to browse your Facebook account using a secure built-in browser that protects your privacy and enables you to browse through the videos you want to save on your device so that you can watch or share them later from your gallery with your friends via different apps.


New: Now you can save videos from Facebook to your gallery using the video link/URL, just copy/paste the video link/URL and start downloading the video without login, no login required!

Method 1 (Download videos from Facebook using the built-in browser):

descriptionHTML:
Become the chef of your own restaurant in an exciting and FREE time management game! Cooking Diary is the best cooking game recognized by prestigious awards, loved and supported by MILLIONS OF PLAYERS around the world! Caution: this game can cause real culinary fever!

Welcome to Tasty Hills‚Äîa city where everyone loves to cook! It's your turn to keep a cooking diary. Help your grandpa save his family restaurant chain and build his reputation back up! Don't give your competitors a single chance to cook up evil plans, while you find true friends, manage restaurants and caf√©s, and cook top-quality dishes! Join fascinating events in the city's vibrant lifestyle, and gain fame as a great chef!

Features:
‚óè COOK hundreds of delicious recipes from around the world!
‚óè OPEN dozens of restaurants and caf√©s in all the districts of Tasty Hills and decorate them to your taste!
‚óè AMAZE the whole world by trying on ultra-stylish looks!
‚óè MAKE FRIENDS with cute and amazing pets of all kinds!
‚óè WIN in various culinary competitions with lots of prizes!
‚óè INTERACT with the residents of the city and immerse yourself in an exciting story!

üèÜ Winner of the WEBBY PEOPLE'S VOICE AWARD 2020 for Strategy/Simulation Game
üèÜ International Mobile Gaming Awards 2019 People's Choice Award winner

recentChanges:
Our Stranger Things limited-time event has started!

SPECIAL EVENTS

‚Ä¢ Path to Glory: a pet Demogorgon and Steve Harrington as an assistant.

‚Ä¢ Scoops Ahoy restaurant: help the characters from the series save the Starcourt Mall!

‚Ä¢ Food Truck: take an amazing ride with Eleven and Max!

STRANGER THINGS ‚Ñ¢/¬© Netflix. 2020. Used with permission.
comments: The feedback by developers that "levels are balanced and can be completed without purchases" is bogus. That's like saying you can walk 20 miles to work if you don't have a car. Technically true, practically untenable. Unless you don't care about quickly progressing through levels and don't mind saving up measly 2-ruby daily rewards...skip this. It's an awesome game but without making constant in-app purchases, it's too frustrating to be worth anyone's time. Also the house/pet features are dumb.

It's fun but can get get frustratingly difficult. It's annoying how many gems you need to upgrade your restaurants later when you barely get any. I wish they would change it so you can buy the pet stuff with coins instead of gems, because I don't want to waste my precious gems on them. I know you can get pet stuff via challenges but it can be difficult.

I did so much progress in this game, unlocking new restaurants and having so much equipment and upgraded stuff, I don't remember when or why, but I uninstalled it, now I remembered it and I installed it again, as expected everything was gone, I just made a character and did the tutorial, afterwards, it showed my saves, and it showed that other save and I thought it would bring back all the progress I'd done but it didn't, I just want to know how to restore everything.

I love how there seems to be endless levels without in-app purchases. But... when I first started to play upgrading the interior of the restaurants cost way less bank notes. I don't want to spend hard earned gems on that. I'm saving those for the kitchen. Why did you guys jack up the prices of things? Plus the new house thing. The shear amount of gems I'd need to purchase ONE piece of furniture is rediculous!! So i pretty much ignore that feature. And why do in-app purch cost so much?

I honestly really enjoyed this game to begin with. It was fun, interesting and I really like the guild feature. But I've been playing for maybe a week or so and now it's asking me to pay rubies to upgrade things. I don't have a lot of rubies and I think it's really silly that that are so expensive! You don't earn nearly enough rubies to actually make it worth the wait. The entire game is centered around them and it's really not fun to play anymore as everything gets more expensive! :(

title: Calorie Counter - MyFitnessPal
description:
Whether you want to lose weight, tone up, get healthy, change your habits, or start a new diet MyFitnessPal has you covered. Our members have lost over 200 million pounds and 88% of people who track for at least 7 days on MyFitnessPal lose weight. Sign up for FREE and start living a happier and healthier life today!

See for yourself why MyFitnessPal is the world‚Äôs most popular health and fitness app.

‚ñåTRACKING FOOD IS FAST AND EASY 
‚ñ† Biggest Food Database -- 11+ million foods in our database including global items and cuisines. 
‚ñ† Barcode Scanner -- Simply scan barcodes to log foods. 4+ million barcodes recognized. 
‚ñ† Recipe Importer -- Easily import the nutrition information for the recipes you cook.
‚ñ† Restaurant Logging -- Quickly log menu items from your favorite restaurants.
‚ñ† Food Insights -- Learn how to make healthier choices about the foods you eat. 
‚ñ† Personalized Experience -- Create your own foods, recipes, and meals and save favorites. 
‚ñ† Calorie Counter -- We automatically calculate the calories in your foods, meals and recipes.
‚ñ† Macro Tracker -- We automatically calculate the macros (carbs, fat, protein) in your foods, meals and recipes.
‚ñ† Track All Nutrients -- Calories, macros (carbs, fat, protein), sugar, fiber, cholesterol, vitamins, and more.
‚ñ† Customize Your Diary -- Log breakfast, lunch, dinner and snacks or create your own meals. 
‚ñ† Water Tracking -- Log water in cups, ounces or ml. We save your recently logged amounts.

‚ñåREACH YOUR GOALS
‚ñ† Choose A Goal -- We support weight loss, weight gain, and weight maintenance goals.  
‚ñ† Goal Setting -- Create your own goals or let us create personalized goals for you, including calorie and macros goals.
‚ñ† Change Habits -- It's almost like having a nutrition coach right inside your pocket.

‚ñåLOG YOUR EXERCISE AND STEPS 
‚ñ† Connect 50+ Apps & Devices -- Syncing your workouts is easy and automatic.
‚ñ† Choose From 350+ Exercises -- Or create your own exercises and workouts. 
‚ñ† Log Cardio Exercises -- Including running, walking, biking, swimming, yoga, pilates and more. 
‚ñ† Log Strength Exercises -- Including sets, reps, and weight per set. 
‚ñ† Track Steps -- Set a daily step goal and see a graph of your step history. 
‚ñ† We connect with all your favorite apps and devices -- Including Fitbit, Jawbone UP, Garmin, MapMyFitness, Runkeeper, Strava, Runtastic, Misfit, Withings, HealthKit, UA Record and many more!

‚ñåGET SUPPORT AND MOTIVATION 
‚ñ† Add Friends -- Connect with friends for an extra layer of support and accountability.
‚ñ† Join Our Community -- Find motivation, support, tips, and advice in our active forums. 
‚ñ† Newsfeed Updates -- Share your accomplishments and see friend‚Äôs progress in the newsfeed.

‚ñåCELEBRATE YOUR SUCCESS 
‚ñ† Chart Your Progress -- Stay motivated with a graph of how you‚Äôre improving over time.
‚ñ† Progress Photos -- Add photos to your weight entries to see and celebrate your progress. 
‚ñ† Nutrition Reports -- View a history of your calories, macros, and nutrient intake. 
‚ñ† Share Your Progress -- Help inspire friends and family members on their own health journey.

Download MyFitnessPal and start living a happier and healthier life today!

For our full terms and conditions and our privacy policy, please visit: https://account.underarmour.com/privacy?locale=en
